document_data.name: Watchful Eye (Hluthvar)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Watchful Eye''' was the only inn in [[Hluthvar]] around [[1368 DR]].

Structure.Interior: The rooms were plain and the beds were very hard.

document_data.Atmosphere: The Watchful Eye of Hluthvar was a dour place that was at least quiet, almost unnerving, like [[Volothamp Geddarm]] stated in [[Volo's Guide to the Sword Coast]], "calm before a vicious storm".
document_data.Services: The inn served served simple food and diluted beer.
